title: Starling Cycles release 15 Ltd. Ed. Stainless Murmur Enduro frames with bare metal finish
content:
Bristol-based steel mountain bike manufacturer, Starling Cycles, have released their Murmur enduro frame in limited edition stainless steel. There will be just 15 of these bare-metal beauties knocking around, in sizes Large and XL only. With that clean-looking raw finish, you’ll surely have to act fast if you want to get your hands on this […]

The post Starling Cycles release 15 Ltd. Ed. Stainless Murmur Enduro frames with bare metal finish appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
